title: Joined Imam in silent rakah & Imam went to ruku, should I complete my fateha or not? Assim al hakeem
transcript: offer the remaining of your prayers if i joined the imam while he's standing position so i said allahu akbar it's a silent prayer so the moment i said alhamdulillah if you are certain that if you continue with your fatiha quickly and you can attain record with him do so if not as in the case i just started and he made rokur then go for rukur and you would take the same ruling as a person who came while the imam was in the quran allah knows best you
